releaseNotes:
Noty v1.9 - Android 12 Compatibility Update

• Android 12 Support: Fixed crashes and compatibility issues with Android 12 and newer devices
• Improved Notifications: Updated handling of notifications and alarms to support new Android requirements
• Permissions Management: Added support for new permission model for scheduling exact alarms
• Enhanced Stability: Fixed null pointer exceptions in todo item handling
• Updated Overlays: Modernized overlay displays using current Android standards
• Bug Fixes: Addressed various issues to improve overall app stability
